adDetails: A course designed for Beginning and Intermediate Real Estate Investors. Learn from an experienced, local Real Estate Broker the in and outs of the Napa Real Estate Market. In this course you'll learn to analyze investment opportunities, calculate your rate of return on your proposed investments, income tax concerns, and Real Estate Business Vocabulary. You learn in a fun and relaxed atmosphere show contact info Christine Hannah, Homes of the Napa Valley, www.ChristineHannah.com
